sentences: Jasper van 't Hof (born 30 June 1947) is a Dutch jazz pianist and keyboard player.
Van 't Hof was born in Enschede, Overijssel, Netherlands, and began studying piano at the age of five.
In 1969, he became a member of Courbois' early European jazz rock band Association P.C., with German guitarist Toto Blanke.
In 1974, he founded Pork Pie and teamed up with Philip Catherine (guitar), Charlie Mariano (saxophone), Aldo Romano (drums), and Jean-Fran√ßois Jenny Clark (bass guitar).
David Friedman, Birds of a Feather (Traumton, 1999)
Heinz Sauer, Hamburg Episode Live at Fabrik (Art of Groove, 2015)
Sigi Schwab, Solo's, Duo's and Trio's (Keytone, 1982)
Archie Shepp, The Fifth of May (L+R, 1987)
